item.title: FT Most Read: Sunday, February 23, 2025 at 8:15 PM UTC
item.description:
1. Zelenskyy offers to step down in exchange for peace and Nato membership
2. Buffett seeks to reassure shareholders over record cash pile
3. US says revenue from minerals deal will fuel Ukraine’s postwar growth
4. [Opinion] Economic partnership will protect the Ukrainian people and the US taxpayer
5. Alternative for Germany set to make gains as Germany goes to the polls
item.guid: FT Most Read: Sunday, February 23, 2025 at 8:15 PM UTC
